item.title: Network-based allocation of responsibility for GHG emissions
item.description: In this paper we allocate responsibilities for GHG emissions in a network.

item.title: Responsibility value on digraphs
item.description: [Work in progress] We take a mathematical and cooperative game theoretical approach at an upstream responsibility value.

item.description: This paper shows other things. Published in Journal Name, 2015.
